trans-unit.source: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control and two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> controls that are used to set a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.
trans-unit.target: A vezérlő egyszerű, amely kezeli a pozicionálás és méretezését jelöli egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> vezérlő és a két <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> beállításához használt vezérlők

trans-unit.source: The Track control does not have a default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: A Track vezérlő nincs alapértelmezett <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is implemented as part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>részeként van megvalósítva a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>vezérlők.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The Track has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls that are used to change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: A Track rendelkezik egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>vezérlő és a két <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>módosítása használt vezérlők a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>követése vezérlőelem.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a Track on a slider.
trans-unit.target: Az alábbi ábrán látható egy csúszkát nyomon.

trans-unit.source: **A Track on a Slider** ![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb") The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> properties that they automatically bind to.
trans-unit.target: **Egy csúszkát a nyomon**![RepeatButton, USB](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, görgetőgomb") az alábbi táblázat a Track tulajdonságait és a megfelelő <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>automatikusan kötődnek a tulajdonságokhoz.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: When either property changes, the bound property also changes.
trans-unit.target: Bármelyik tulajdonság megváltozásakor a kötött tulajdonság is megváltozik.

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: | Tulajdonság nyomon követése |} <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>tulajdonság |} |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Az alábbi táblázat a Track tulajdonságait és a megfelelő <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>tulajdonságai, amelyhez azokat kötési nyomon része egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>vezérlő és nyomon követése tulajdonságainak vannak nincs explicit módon beállítva.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| The following table shows the Track properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> properties to which they bind when a Track is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and the Track properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: | Tulajdonság nyomon követése |} <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>tulajdonság |} |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Az alábbi táblázat a Track tulajdonságait és a megfelelő <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>tulajdonságai, amelyhez azokat kötési nyomon része egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>vezérlő és nyomon követése tulajdonságainak vannak nincs explicit módon beállítva.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: |Track property|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> property| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control bind with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the Track control.
trans-unit.target: | Tulajdonság nyomon követése |} <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>tulajdonság |} |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| Emellett a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>tulajdonságait a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>szabályozza a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>a vezérlő kötési a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>tulajdonságai között a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>követése vezérlő vezérlők.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: When a Track is used to scroll content, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: Nyomon kell görgetnie használatakor a tartalom, mérete a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>vezérlő arányos százalékos arányát a látható területén vagy a nézőpont megjelenő tartalmat.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control that implements a Track control.
trans-unit.target: Az alábbi ábrán egy példa egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>vezérlő követése vezérlő megvalósító.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: **A ScrollBar that has a Track control** ![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration") The following calculation is used to compute the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: **Amely egy követése szabályozza a görgetősáv**![görgetősáv illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "görgetősáv illlustration") a következő számítási a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> méretének kiszámításához használt

trans-unit.source: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength The viewportSize parameter is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize)) × trackLength viewportSize paraméter értékének a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: A maximális és minimális paraméterek a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>tulajdonságértékek.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the expression maximum–minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: A kifejezés maximális értéke – minimális + viewportSize a görgethető tartalom.

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the Track when the content is scrolled to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: Vegye figyelembe, hogy az értékét a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>tulajdonság jelöli a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>a szám, amikor a tartalom felülről lefelé görgetése közben.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is not the same as the length or extent of the content.
trans-unit.target: Ez <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>értéke nem azonos a hossza vagy a tartalom mértékét.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed explanation, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Részletesebb magyarázatáért lásd: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: Az <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>a szám egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>felülről vagy balról jobbra attól függően, hogy a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> irányának növeli</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> a</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a Track in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: Hasonlóképpen, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>alulról vagy balról jobbra attól függően, hogy a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> irányának növeli</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> a track</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the direction of increasing value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property of the Track to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Az érték növelésével irányának módosításához állítsa a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>való követése tulajdonságának `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Creates the layout for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az elrendezés létrehozása a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The area that is provided for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A területen megjelenik a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to use for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> való használatra a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> tartalmat.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that decreases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> , amely csökkenti a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>tulajdonsága a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>vezérlő egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>vezérlő, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>tulajdonságainak a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>ellenőrzése a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kötést létrehozni a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>vezérlő.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that reduces the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> , amely csökkenti a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>, a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> szabályozza, amikor a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> lenyomásakor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> vezérlő alapértelmezett beállításokkal.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A gyermeke lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> a megadott indexnél.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Alárendelt elemei megad egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>úgy, hogy a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>Tulajdonságok.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Az alárendelt összetevők indexelt tulajdonságai vannak beállítva a sorrendben.

trans-unit.source: The index of the child.
trans-unit.target: A gyermek indexe.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> at the specified index in the list of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: Az objektumot ad vissza a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> visual gyermekelemek listájában megadott indexnél.

trans-unit.source: The index must be a number between zero (0) and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: Az index nulla (0) és az értékének számnak kell lennie a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>mínusz egy (1) tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: The specified index is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: A megadott index az értéke nagyobb a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>mínusz egy (1) tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> property of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> , amely növeli a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>tulajdonsága a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> osztály</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>vezérlő egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>vezérlő, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>tulajdonságainak a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>ellenőrzése a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>kötést létrehozni a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>vezérlő.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> that increases the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> , amely növeli a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>, a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> szabályozza, amikor a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> lenyomásakor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> vezérlő alapértelmezett beállításokkal.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> is reversed from the default direction.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja az e növelése irányának <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>alapértelmezett irányát a fordított irányú.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When the value of IsDirectionReversed is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> exchange places.
trans-unit.target: Ha a IsDirectionReversed értéke `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>és a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>a a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>exchange-helyek.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values increase from left to right for both horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>értékek növelése balról jobbra a mindkét vízszintes <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>vezérlők.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> these values increase from bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: Azonban a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>értékeket függőleges <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>növelje a felső alsó, mivel a függőleges <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>ezeket az értékeket növelje a lista aljáról felfelé.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: When you set the IsDirectionReversed property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses.
trans-unit.target: Ha a IsDirectionReversed tulajdonság értéke `true`, az érték növelésével irányának megfordítása.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the IsDirectionReversed property, the IsDirectionReversed property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>részeként egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>vezérlő, és nincs explicit módon beállítva a IsDirectionReversed tulajdonság, a IsDirectionReversed tulajdonság van kötve a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Függőségtulajdonság adatai ||| |-|-| | Alkalmazásazonosító mezőben |} | | Metaadat-tulajdonságainak beállítása `true`|} Nincs |}

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton*> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton*> exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <> </> *> és a <> </> *> cseréje pozíciók érték növelése irányának pedig fordított, ha <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Azonosítja a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>függőség tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Az azonosítóját, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>függőség tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum possible <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja azt a maximális lehetséges <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>, a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the Maximum property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>vezérlő egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>vezérlő és a Maximum tulajdonság nincs megadva, ez a tulajdonság automatikusan van kötve a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The Maximum value for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: A maximális értéke egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>vezérlő megegyezik a látható tartalom terület vagy a nézőpont méretének mínusz görgethető tartalom mérete.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is 30, the value of the Maximum property is 70.
trans-unit.target: Például, ha a tartalom mérete 100 és méretének a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>tulajdonság 30, a Maximum tulajdonság értéke 70.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is true because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: Ez érvényét veszti, mert a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>vezérlő megfelel-e a nézőpont tetején megjelenő görgethető tartalmat pozíciója.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: A tartalom az ebben a példában a legalsó görgetése közben, a tartalom 30 százalékával továbbra is megjelennek a nézőpont.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the Maximum value is 70.
trans-unit.target: Ezért a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>, amely megfelel a nézőpont felső 70, a maximális értéke pedig 70.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> corresponds to a position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: A következő ábra azt mutatja be az <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>egy pozíciójára felel meg a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>a egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>vezérlő.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték az 1.

trans-unit.target: A szám a rendelkezésre álló terület méretét.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> is displayed horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdez vagy beállít egy értéket, amely jelzi, hogy a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> vízszintes vagy függőleges irányban jelenik meg.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the Orientation property, the Orientation property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>vezérlő, és nincs kifejezetten beállítása a Orientation tulajdonsága, a tájolás tulajdonság van kötve a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> részeként</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> üzembe helyezése

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the Orientation property, the Orientation property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>vezérlő, és nincs kifejezetten beállítása a Orientation tulajdonsága, a tájolás tulajdonság van kötve a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> részeként</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> üzembe helyezése

trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> vezérlést, amellyel módosíthatja a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>, egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control that is used with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> használt vezérlő a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control that has default settings.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> vezérlő alapértelmezett beállításokkal.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> as determined by the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> control.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a jelenlegi érték a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> szerint pozíciója a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>vezérlő.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: The Value represents a value that is between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: Az érték azt jelenti, közötti értéket a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A>tulajdonságértékek.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the Value property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>vezérlő része egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>vezérlő és a tulajdonság nincs megadva érték, ez a tulajdonság automatikusan van kötve a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A jelenlegi érték a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték a 0.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the change in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> moves.
trans-unit.target: Kiszámítja az módosítása a <> </> *>, a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref> amikor a <> </> *> helyezi át.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal displacement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.
trans-unit.target: A vízszintes elmozdulását a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>

trans-unit.source: The vertical displacement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> függőleges irányban

trans-unit.source: The change in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> that corresponds to the displacement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A változás <> </> *> elmozdulásának, amely megfelel a <> </> *>, a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the distance from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> to a specified point along the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kiszámítja a mezőktől való távolságot a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> mentén adott pontra a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified point.
trans-unit.target: A megadott pontot.

trans-unit.source: The distance between the and the specified pt value.
trans-unit.target: Közötti távolságot a és a megadott pt érték.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Azonosítja a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>függőség tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Az azonosítóját, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>függőség tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the part of the scrollable content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a görgethető tartalmat a látható részét.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the ViewportSize is not <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A ViewportSize tulajdonság méretének számításához a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>lévő vezérlése egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>a ViewportSize esetén nem <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: További információkért lásd: a Megjegyzések a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, create an object that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class and provide overrides for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Explicit módon határozhatja meg <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>Hozzon létre egy objektumot, amely az <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>osztályhoz, és adja meg a felülbírálásokat <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A>és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> származik</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> mérete

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the ViewportSize property, the ViewportSize property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>részeként egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>vezérlő, és nincs explicit módon beállítva a ViewportSize tulajdonság, a ViewportSize tulajdonság van kötve a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The value of the ViewportSize property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control is always <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>, because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control does not change size.
trans-unit.target: A ViewportSize tulajdonságának értéke egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>vezérlő, amely meg van valósítva a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>vezérlő mindig van <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName>, mert a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>vezérlő nem változtatja meg a méretet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Függőségtulajdonság adatai ||| |-|-| | Alkalmazásazonosító mezőben |} | | Metaadat-tulajdonságainak beállítása `true`|}: |

trans-unit.source: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: A görgethető tartalom látható terület méretét.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, which means that the content size is not defined.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, ami azt jelenti, hogy a tartalom mérete nincs definiálva.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Azonosítja a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>függőség tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Az azonosítóját, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>függőség tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A gyermek elemeinek száma lekérdezi egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Alárendelt elemei megad egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>úgy, hogy a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, és <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A>Tulajdonságok.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Az alárendelt összetevők indexelt tulajdonságai vannak beállítva a sorrendben.

trans-unit.source: An integer between 0 and 2 that specifies the number of child elements in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 0 és 2, a gyermek elemek száma közötti egész számot a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"> </xref>.
